attributes.action: Climate Change - Over crowding Britain of Peolpe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We need our space to live and for the past 10 years over crowding has growing, such as airports, car parks and roads and housing, were we should not build.
No Planing by Labour.

rejection.details: Your petition title should be a clear call for action, not a statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
